title: [Health] A large-scale analysis of people (N=24,000 adults across the United States from 2005 to 2016) who eat mushrooms suggests they have a lower risk of developing depression. The association is still a mystery, and for now, the authors say the data should be interpreted with caution.

[Medicine] In patients with tuberous sclerosis complex, long-term add-on CBD treatment was well tolerated and sustainably reduced seizures through 48 weeks, with most patients/caregivers reporting global improvement
